sourcesContent:
<template>
    {{ isLogged }}

    <input type="text" placeholder="Evento">
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "AreaConvalidatore",
    data() {
        return {
            isLogged:  false,
        }
    },

    mounted() {
        if(localStorage.getItem("convalidatoreLogged")) {
            this.isLogged = true;
        }
    }
}
</script>
